title: Roast Rib of Beef with Horseradish Cream
ingredients: ['3.6kg rib of beef', '3 tablespoons prepared mustard', '1 bunch kale', '350ml double cream', '4 tablespoons horseradish', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '120g chopped and toasted walnuts', 'salt and pepper to taste']
